competition_summary.context: Competition; • Prevailing housing products, features, cost and pricing; and • Performance capabilities of our local management team. Economies of Scale We are the largest homebuilding company in the United States as measured by number of homes closed in fiscal 2024, and we are also one of the largest builders in most of the markets in which we operate. We believe that our national, regional and local scale of operations provides us with benefits that may not be available to the same degree to so
